attributes.action: Address payment for web designers and teachers developing free resource materials for schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many web sites are created on a voluntary basis - for altruistic reasons to promote learning and share resources between professionals, but some companies appear to be exploiting this - we urge the PM to make all written work paid (perhaps even funds from DFES - as a boost to the economy - educate, educate educate, (remember !)- and the salaries of teachers and web designers. (see kidstories.wordpress.com as an example).
What kind of incentive is this ? When public sector workers are expected to work for free ?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
